review: I am very satisfied with Chromecast! My tv isn't a smart tv so it makes my life easier. Now I can watch Netflix and Youtube videos on my TV! Using it 24/7!
author: Luiza T.

review: Bought it to enable me to send an AVI or MP4 movie to my TV through the air from my Win 7 laptop without cables.  I cannot get it to work.  Must be me, a retired IT director.
author: PopPop "PopPop"

review: I boughy as a gift 4, they loved

review: there is barely any compatibility with it to just about anything besides YouTube, and the audio can only be played out of the source it is streaming to which isn't helpful for surround sound.
author: Alec Kendall

review: 17 year old daughter set up the Media player in about 5 minutes.Easy set and use. No problems, She really enjoys using it.
author: Michael Mustard "Mike M."

review: Limited in what you can stream. Not impressed.
